item.title: A Quick Review of Mint.com - from both a user and programmer perspective
item.description: For those of you who are unfamiliar with Mint.com, it’s a free online personal finance site that allows you to track spending across all of your bank accounts and manage budgets and financial goals. Once upon a time it was a nice little Web 2.0 startup, now …

item.title: Acer X233Hbid Review
item.description: I just bought myself a new monitor for my MythTV box, as I’ve moved my beautiful Acer AL2416W 24”er to my new desktop. The chosen monitor, based on price, reviews and features, is the Acer X233Hbid. It’s a 23” 16:9 (not 16:10) monitor that runs …

item.title: Brother HL-2170W - great features from a personal laser printer
item.description:
I’ve posted an update about serious DHCP problems with this unit.

Last week my mother’s printer died, and she asked me to find a new one for her. After a quick look on NewEgg (sort by ratings is a wonderful thing) I found the Brother HL-2170W. Aside …

item.title: Bug/Issue Tracking - Update / Review of Eventum
item.description: So, after many hours of investigating potential bug/issue tracking packages, I have chosen one. And gone live with it, all in one weekend. After much evaluation, my final choice was Eventum from MySQL (I’m using the current version, 2.0.1). I will admit that it is not …
